abstract: Creates a speech recognition request, initialized with the specified URL.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this method to create a request to recognize speech in a recorded audio file that resides at the specified URL. Pass the request to the recognizer’s [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognizer/recognitionTask(with:delegate:)] method to start recognition.

# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Creates a speech recognition request, initialized with the specified URL.

## Declaration

```swift
init(url URL: URL)
```

## Discussion

Use this method to create a request to recognize speech in a recorded audio file that resides at the specified URL. Pass the request to the recognizer’s [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognizer/recognitionTask(with:delegate:)] method to start recognition.
title: init(url:)
